animeTitle: Katsute Mahou Shoujo to Aku wa Tekitai shiteita.
otherNames: The Magical Girl and the Evil Lieutenant Used to Be Archenemies, かつて魔法少女と悪は敵対していた。
synopsis: The manga tells the story of Mira, who leads an evil organization trying to take over and destroy everything. Earth is under attack, but a magical girl named Byakuya Mimori stands up to Mira's group. As they face off, something unexpected happens—Mira falls in love with Mimori.
